meanings.definition: A raised molding on the edge of a door or panel.
meanings.sent1: The carpenter carefully added bolections to the door for a decorative touch.
meanings.sent2: The bolections on the panel enhanced its overall appearance.
meanings.sent3: The bolections on the door seemed to give it a fancy mustache.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity knew no bounds as she used bolections to frame her artwork.
meanings.sent5: The bolections stood out like proud soldiers guarding the door.

meanings.definition: The act of adding a raised molding to a surface.
meanings.sent1: After hours of work, the bolections were finally complete on the surface.
meanings.sent2: The intricate design of the bolections added depth to the surface.
meanings.sent3: The bolections seemed to dance along the surface as they were being added.
meanings.sent4: Her hands moved swiftly, shaping the bolections with precision.
meanings.sent5: The bolections transformed the surface into a work of art.
